Intelligence Protection Organization of the Islamic Republic of Iran Army (), acronymed SAHEFAJA (), is a military intelligence agency with a mission to perform counterespionage measures inside the army in order to prevent, discover and neutralize possible subversions, sabotages and coup d'etats. It has an independent command hierarchy from the army.
Directors
* Mustafa Torabipour (1987–1998)
* Mehdi Montazeri (1998–2001)
* Akbar Diyantfar (2001–2005)
* fareang memar nehavandi (2005–?)
* Mohammad Hassan Habibian (?–2018)
See also
* List of counterintelligence organizations
* Intelligence Protection Organization of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps – similar agency
